Author: NaughtyNeko
Name: NNekoTriggers
Punchline: Automatically execute commands under certain conditions.
Description:
Sets per-character chat command triggered on:
- Zone changes
 - Class/Job Swaps
- Login
 Other Options:
 - Roleplay Only Toggle (Blocks unless "RP" Online Status is set)
 - RNG Toggle (Triggers fire randomly, given a custom min/max range)
 - Override Toggle (Overrides commands set for all triggers with a master command)
